articles.title: Americans see disparities in mental and physical care, survey finds - The Washington Post
articles.description: Of the respondents: 51 percent reported experiencing depression, anxiety or another mental health condition in the previous 12 months.
articles.content: When asked, 75 percent of survey respondents said they felt mental health conditions are identified and treated worse than physical health issues, according to a new survey from West Health and Gallu… [+318 chars]

articles.author: Angus Watson, Sophie Jeong, Heather Chen, Lucas Lilieholm, Teele Rebane
articles.title: As many as 2,000 people feared buried under Papua New Guinea landslide as survivors dig with hands and spades - CNN
articles.description: As many as 2,000 people are feared to have been buried by last week’s massive landslide in Papua New Guinea, according to the country’s National Disaster Centre, as survivors recounted the horror losing so many loved ones.

articles.author: Cindy Von Quednow
articles.title: Former ‘General Hospital’ actor Johnny Wactor fatally shot in Los Angeles - CNN
articles.description: Former “General Hospital” actor Johnny Wactor was fatally shot in downtown Los Angeles while interrupting thieves Saturday, according to his agent and CNN affiliate KABC.
articles.content:
